titocc.compiler.elements

Class ReturnStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.elements.CodeElement
      • titocc.compiler.elements.Statement
        • titocc.compiler.elements.ReturnStatement

  • public class ReturnStatement
extends Statement
    Statement that exits the from the current function, optionally setting the return value.

    EBNF definition:
    RETURN_STATEMENT = "return" [EXPRESSION] ";"

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReturnStatement

        public ReturnStatement(Expression expression,
               int line,
               int column)
        Constructs a ReturnStatement.
        Parameters:
        expression - expression for the returned value, or null if there is none
        line - starting line number of the return statement
        column - starting column/character of the return statement

      • compile

        public void compile(Assembler asm,
           Scope scope,
           Registers regs)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    SyntaxException
        Description copied from class: Statement
        Generates assembly code for the statement.
        Specified by:
        compile in class Statement
        Parameters:
        asm - assembler used for code generation
        scope - scope in which the statement is evaluated
        regs - available registers; must have at least one active register
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if assembler throws
        SyntaxException - if statement contains an error

      • parse

        public static ReturnStatement parse(TokenStream tokens)
        Attempts to parse a return statement from token stream. If parsing fails the stream is reset to its initial position.
        Parameters:
        tokens - source token stream
        Returns:
        ReturnStatement object or null if tokens don't form a valid return statement
